price: dan lemparkanlah tongkatmu.  Maka tatkala (tongkat itu menjadi ular dan) Musa melihatnya bergerak-gerak seolah-olah dia seekor ular yang gesit, larilah ia berbalik ke belakang tanpa menoleh.  (Kemudian, Musa diseru), "Hai Musa datanglah kepada-Ku dan janganlah kamu takut. Sesungguhnya kamu termasuk orang-orang yang aman.
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنّٞ وَلَّىٰ مُدۡبِرٗا وَلَمۡ يُعَقِّبۡۚ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ أَقۡبِلۡ وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ إِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓمِنِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-an alqi ʿaṣāka falammā raāhā tahtazzu ka-annahā jānnun wallā mud'biran walam yuʿaqqib yāmūsā aqbil walā takhaf innaka mina al-āminīna
